name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AMZ Cart Export: Export your Amazon cart to CSV

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export your Amazon cart to a CSV spreadsheet, including their title, ASIN, price, quantity and URL of all your cart items.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Export your Amazon cart to a CSV/Excel spreadsheet with this extension!

This extension exports all the items in your Amazon shopping cart to a CSV spreadsheet, including your items title, ASIN, price, quantity, total cost and product link. 

(Note: A CSV is a spreadsheet which you can import directly into Excel or Google Sheets.)

------

How It Works:

‚¨áÔ∏è Install the Chrome extension: Begin by installing the AMZ Cart Export Chrome extension. Our lightweight extension lets you quickly export your Amazon cart to a CSV/Excel spreadsheet.

üíæ Export your Amazon cart: Navigate to your Amazon cart and click the AMZ Cart Export extension icon. In one click, you can export the items in your Amazon cart to a CSV/Excel spreadsheet, including their title, ASIN, price, quantity and product link.

üíª Open your spreadsheet: Open your spreadsheet in Excel or Google Sheets. Now you have all the items in your Amazon cart in a handy spreadsheet format.

------

FAQ:

Q: How do I export my Amazon cart?
A: To export your Amazon cart with AMZ Cart Export, start by installing our Chrome extension. Then visit your Amazon cart page, open our extension, and use it to export a CSV/Excel spreadsheet of your Amazon cart items. Open this spreadsheet with Excel or Google Sheets to view all your cart items.

Q: What fields does the CSV spreadsheet include?
A: When you export a CSV/Excel spreadsheet of your Amazon cart items, it includes the following fields: Title, ASIN, Quantity, Price, Total Cost and Product Link. 

Q: Does the CSV spreadsheet stay updated?
A: No, the CSV spreadsheet of your Amazon cart items generated with AMZ Cart Export does not stay updated. If you change the items in your cart, you should use our extension to export a new spreadsheet. Our Chrome extension creates a spreadsheet of all the items in your cart at the current moment, and unfortunately it's impossible for us to update it.

------

Install our Chrome Extension to quickly export your Amazon cart to a CSV/Excel spreadsheet. It's free, easy to use, and takes 1 minute to get started.

Note: Product links exported via the AMZ Cart Export Chrome extension include an affiliate tag.
